component.name: GridScreenItem
component.script:
function itemContentChanged() as void itemData = m.top.itemContent
if itemData.posterThumbnail <> invalid AND itemData.posterThumbnail <> "" AND itemData.usePoster m.itemImage.loadDisplayMode = "scaleToFit" m.itemImage.loadWidth = 147 m.itemImage.loadHeight = 262 m.itemImage.uri = itemData.posterThumbnail else m.itemImage.loadDisplayMode = "scaleToFit" m.itemImage.loadWidth = 262 m.itemImage.loadHeight = 147 m.itemImage.uri = itemData.HDPOSTERURL end if
end function function init() as void m.itemImage = m.top.findNode("itemImage") end function
